dict.acceptation: 立即，马上；直接地；紧接地；

sent.orig: I put out a hand immediately pickpocket's hand which hits my pants pocket, he receives immediately.
sent.trans: 我马上伸手打我裤袋的那只扒手的手，他马上收回去。

sent.orig: Upon receiving this policy, check immediately. If there any error, contact our company immediately for correction.
sent.trans: 收到本保险单后，请即核对，如有错误，立即通知本公司更正。

sent.orig: The FAO has suggested several majors(measures) to deal immediately (immediately) deal with the situation.
sent.trans: 粮农组织建议几个测量方法很快处理形式。

sent.orig: Clear the entrance of the liferaft immediately after entering. Sit down in the liferaft immediately.
sent.trans: 当进入救生筏后应立即保持入口畅通，坐在救生筏内。

sent.orig: Falluja answer is very simply: "to be shared immediately even immediately rule? "
sent.trans: 陆贾回答得也很干脆：“马上得之，宁可以马上治乎？”
